# Wacky Works Digital

> Custom Automation & SaaS Studio based in the UK. We build digital assets that generate revenue, save time, and automate workflows.

## What We Do

We help businesses automate boring stuff so humans can do interesting stuff. Our specialty is connecting AI, automation, and modern web tech to create systems that work while you sleep.

## Services

### AI Agents
Custom AI assistants that handle customer support, data analysis, and repetitive tasks 24/7. Built with modern LLMs, trained on your business data.

### Workflow Automation
We wire up your apps using n8n, Zapier, and Make.com so they actually talk to each other. CRM to spreadsheet to Slack to email - all automatic.

### RAG & Knowledge Systems
Turn messy documents into an AI that actually knows your business. Custom knowledge bases, document Q&A, internal search.

### App Development
Mobile apps, web apps, SaaS platforms. From idea to app store. React Native, Next.js, modern tech stack.

### Websites
Fast, modern websites built with Next.js and React. Animations, SEO, responsive design. Not your grandma's WordPress.

### E-commerce
Shopify stores, product listings, checkout optimization. We make people click 'buy now' instead of 'maybe later'.

### Social & Video
Faceless channels, video campaigns, AI-generated content. Look cool on the internet without dancing on camera.

### Branding
Full brand identity packages: strategy, visual identity, tone of voice, guidelines.

### Self-Hosted Tools
n8n, Home Assistant, private AI, all on your own servers. No subscriptions, no data leaving your control.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js / React for web
- n8n for automation
- Supabase for backend
- OpenAI / Claude for AI
- Shopify for e-commerce
- Vercel for hosting

## Location

United Kingdom (remote-first, work with clients worldwide)

## Contact

- Website: https://wearewacky.com
- Email: hello@wearewacky.com

## Brand Voice

Casual, direct, slightly irreverent. We don't take ourselves too seriously but we take the work seriously. No corporate speak. Real talk about what works and what doesn't.

## Tagline

"We're not for everyone. And that's the point."
